Example Logs: Sep 19 22:29:46 172.17.0.1 Sep 19 22:29:46 SYN-NAS WinFileService Event: read, Path: /docker/splunk/apps/TA-synology/default/props.conf, File/Folder: File, Size: 1.89 KB, User: john.smith@ldap.local.com, IP: 192.168.1.59
Fields To Extract: action, path, file_folder, sizeValue, sizeUnit, user, src_ip
Description: When you interact with a file on a network share.

Example Logs: Sep 16 22:42:11 172.17.0.1 Sep 16 22:42:11 SYN-NAS Connection: User [administrator] from [192.168.19.59] signed in to [DSM] successfully via [password].
Fields To Extract: host_ip, hostname, message, user, src_ip, application, auth_method

Example Logs: Sep 19 22:29:46 172.17.0.1 Sep 19 22:29:46 SYN-NAS WinFileService Event: read, Path: /docker/splunk/apps/TA-synology/default/props.conf, File/Folder: File, Size: 1.89 KB, User: john.smith@ldap.local.com, IP: 192.168.1.59
Description: Extracting the filename from the full UNC path.

Example Logs: Sep 19 16:13:31 172.17.0.1 Sep 19 16:13:31 SYN-NAS Connection: User [john.smith@ldap.local.com] from [DESKTOP-600SD3R(192.168.19.59)] via [CIFS(SMB3)] accessed shared folder [Movies].
Fields To Extract: host_ip, hostname, message, user, src_hostname, src_ip, protocol, shared_folder
Description: When you connect to a network share via SMB (may be similar for other protocols).

Sep 19 15:55:08 172.17.0.1 Sep 19 15:55:08 SYN-NAS System: System successfully stopped [FTP].
Fields To Extract: host_ip, hostname, user, action, service name, message

Fields To Extract: host_ip, hostname, user, service, message, service_status
Description: Service is stopped with square brackets around service name.

Example Logs: Sep 16 22:41:50 172.17.0.1 Sep 16 22:41:50 SYN-NAS Connection: User [john.smith@ldap.local.com] from [192.168.19.59] failed to sign in to [DSM] via [password] due to authorization failure.
Fields To Extract: host_ip, hostname, message, username, src_ip, application, auth_method
Description: A user logged attempted to log into DSM with a correct username but an incorrect password.

Example Logs: Sep 16 16:56:30 172.17.0.1 Sep 16 16:56:30 SYN-NAS WinFileService Event: rename, Path: /Documents/Jane/Scans to Sort/invoice.pdf -> /Documents/Jane/Scans to Sort/paid_invoice.pdf, File/Folder: File, Size: 943.95 KB, User: jane.smith@ldap.bourneid.com, IP: 192.168.6.8
Fields To Extract: host_ip, hostname, original_path, new_path, file_folder, file_size, user, src_ip
Description: A user renamed a file via SMB.
